It analyzes social biases in online hiring processes, which are key aspects of social inequality. The study also discusses how UI design can influence discriminatory outcomes.
analysis.other_detail: Focus on online hiring biases and discrimination
analysis.methodology_detail: Simulated hiring decisions via Amazon MTurk

title: Revealing Neural Network Bias to Non-Experts Through Interactive Counterfactual Examples

analysis.other_detail: Focus on social bias detection in AI systems
analysis.methodology_detail: Design and initial testing of an interactive bias visualization tool
